row.name: CONN_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="CONN_CONNECTION_TIMEOUTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Connection Timeout (s)" tooltip="The number of seconds before timing out while attempting to connect to the URL endpoint. When set to 0, the connection never times out. The default is 30 seconds." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

When set to 0, the connection never times out. The default is 30 seconds.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>

row.name: CONN_FOLLOW_REDIRECTS#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="CONN_FOLLOW_REDIRECTSs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Follow Redirects" tooltip="Specifies that the request should follow site redirects. For example, if you are trying to get to http://test.com and that site redirects to http://newtest.com, the request will automatically follow the redirect and connect with http://newtest.com." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Follow Redirects</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">CONN_FOLLOW_REDIRECTSs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies that the request should follow site redirects. For example, if you are trying to get to http://test.com and that site redirects to http://newtest.com, the request will automatically follow the redirect and connect with http://newtest.com.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>

row.name: CONN_READ_TIMEOUT#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="CONN_READ_TIMEOUTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Read Timeout (s)" tooltip="The number of seconds before timing out when waiting for a method call. When set to 0, the read never times out. The default is 60 seconds." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

When set to 0, the read never times out. The default is 60 seconds.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>
